articles.title: Trump’s image of dead ‘white farmers’ came from Congo, not South Africa - CNN
articles.description: The footage shows a mass burial in Goma, Congo, and was filmed by Reuters video journalist Djaffar Al Katanty, who said seeing Trump holding the article with the screengrab of his video was a shock.
articles.content: U.S. President Donald Trump showed a screenshot of Reuters video taken in the Democratic Republic of Congo as part of what he falsely presented on Wednesday as evidence of mass killings of white Sout… [+2652 chars]
